snippet: President Obama plans to nominate Ms. Chu, chief executive of the Kauffman Center for the Performing Arts in Kansas City, to lead the National Endowment for the Arts.
abstract: President Obama plans to nominate Ms. Chu, chief executive of the Kauffman Center for the Performing Arts in Kansas City, to lead the National Endowment for the Arts.

headline.main: Obama to Nominate Jane Chu to Head Arts Endowment
